comments.text:
As the database grows larger and the dataset does too, it would be hard to make the phonebook an offline app that included ALL the data, but storing emails and names would likely be doable.

Not sure if groups would creep up on usual localStorage limits (effectively 5MB).

This is a cool idea that would need to be worked on a bit, but I dig it.
